name: Verdant Gift
desc: Escoffier's inspired creation. A well-presented asparagus salad presented like a lush, green bouquet and drizzled with yellowy-orange sauce. A fresh, crisp mouthful that captures the vitality of soft, young shoots at the very instant they break the surface of the soil â€” it's almost as though Escoffier has moved beyond mastering the careful control of heat and flavor and is now cooking with time itself.

value.text: Increases all party members' ATK by 320 and CRIT Rate by 10% for 300s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).
